. This silent but potentially dangerous condition often goes unnoticed, leading to severe complications if left untreated. In this guide, we will explore the basics of hypertension, its causes, symptoms, and essential strategies for management. read More General Surgery General surgery encompasses a wide range of surgical procedures that address various medical conditions affecting different organ systems. Surgeons specializing in general surgery are skilled in performing surgeries that involve the abdomen, digestive tract, endocrine system, and other essential structures. In this overview, we'll delve into the common procedures performed by general surgeons and the general aspects of the recovery process. read More Gynaecology Gynaecology is a specialized field of medicine dedicated to the health and well-being of the female reproductive system

. read More Gynaecology Gynaecology is a specialized field of medicine dedicated to the health and well-being of the female reproductive system. This comprehensive guide will explore various aspects of gynecology, including routine examinations, common conditions, and essential information to empower women in understanding and managing their reproductive health. read More Pediatrics Pediatrics is a specialized branch of medicine focused on the health and well-being of children from infancy through adolescence. This guide aims to provide parents and caregivers with essential information on pediatric care, covering topics such as developmental milestones, vaccinations, common childhood illnesses, and strategies for maintaining a healthy and thriving child. read More Orthopedics Orthopedics is a medical specialty dedicated to the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of musculoskeletal conditions

. read More Orthopedics Orthopedics is a medical specialty dedicated to the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of musculoskeletal conditions. From fractures to joint disorders, this guide aims to provide an overview of orthopaedic care, covering common orthopaedic conditions, treatment options, and strategies for maintaining bone and joint health. read More Cardiology Cardiology is the medical specialty dedicated to the study, diagnosis, and treatment of heart and blood vessel disorders. This guide aims to provide an overview of cardiology, covering essential topics such as cardiovascular diseases, preventive measures, diagnostic procedures, and treatment options. pkg mch read More View All Who We Are PKG Multispeciality Hospital (PKG) is a 420 beds state-of-the-art multispeciality hospital spread across a sprawling campus of 3.7 acres, located in the heart of Newtown, Kolkata, one of India’s fastest growing satellite city & IT hub in close vicinity to the Kolkata Airport

. Designed as per international standards PKG Multispeciality Hospital aims to be one of the most advanced hospitals in Eastern India with a depth of expertise in a wide range of advanced medical and surgical treatments, alongside a comprehensive blend of inpatient and outpatient healthcare offerings. Striking the goal of equipping skilled and renowned professionals with the latest technology and infrastructure and embedding the principles of constant upliftment through research, reskilling and adoption of newer technologies, PKG Hospital aims to set new standards in healthcare. A dedicated team of medical and paramedical staff assigned to ensure comfort, care and cooperation to the patients and their family members will realize our goal of putting Patients First. . Designed as per international standards PKG Multispeciality Hospital aims to be one of the most advanced hospitals in Eastern India with a depth of expertise in a wide range of advanced medical and surgical treatments, alongside a comprehensive blend of inpatient and outpatient healthcare offerings. Striking the goal of equipping skilled and renowned professionals with the latest technology and infrastructure and embedding the principles of constant upliftment through research, reskilling and adoption of newer technologies, PKG Hospital aims to set new standards in healthcare. A dedicated team of medical and paramedical staff assigned to ensure comfort, care and cooperation to the patients and their family members will realize our goal of putting Patients First. PKG Multispeciality Hospital has the best facilities with the latest technologies and multi departmental support

. PKG Multispeciality Hospital has the best facilities with the latest technologies and multi departmental support. The medical infrastructure includes multispeciality departments, 6 positive pressure operation theaters - laminar flow, well equipped with all modern gadgets for safely conducting all complicated surgeries, 85-bedded ICU (intensive care unit), 10-bedded dialysis unit, 4+4 open care system of level III NICU, isolated pressurized ICU with modern equipment, 6 super deluxe suits with attached guest room, a waiting lounge & cafeteria and specialist doctors and technicians always at your service. About our Hospital PKG serves for achievement centre of excellence in patient care delivery in Eastern India with following missions and visions: Our Mission To serve the cause of millions who seek dedicated quality and affordable healthcare through our multi-specialty facility, latest diagnostic services, and mobile outreach camps

. Be the preferred choice for not only the patients and leading practicing doctors but also the brilliant scientific minds and medical and paramedical professionals skilled with the latest technologies. To develop, apply, evaluate, and share newer technologies for better patient service, early detection, and healthcare accessibility through home-based care, remote monitoring, palliative care, and rehabilitation services. Engage in local community projects through health outreach camps and raise public health awareness. Our Vision To create a quality, affordable, accessible, personalized, world-class integrated health care system for all. Founder Dr. Pradip K. Ghosh, originally from Khardah near Kolkata, moved to the United States for graduate studies in 1968. With a doctorate in economics and engineering from the State University of New York, a diploma in international law from London, and a leadership studies degree from Harvard University, he taught for 22 years at major universities

. Dr. Ghosh, a prominent scholar, educator, entrepreneur, and philanthropist, serves as the Chairman of the World Congress of Religions. His vision includes the development of PKG Multispeciality Hospital, a unique center for medicine, academics, and translational research. The hospital aims to bring together medical professionals, scientists, and students to address diseases, discover remedies, and promote awareness of early screening and prevention, particularly in India and other developing nations. Board of Directors Our Board of Directors and our advisors are at the heart of the governance of our PKG Multispecialty Hospital. Management Awards, Accolades and Accreditions PKG Multispecialty Hospital is aiming for both the NABH & JCI accreditation so as to gain the quality assurance of both national and international clients. Currently, PKG Hospital has an NABL-accredited lab

. Currently, PKG Hospital has an NABL-accredited lab. (This needs to be updated as and when we get any awards or certifications.) Medical Technology at PKG Hospital From the very beginning, PKG Multispecialty Hospital has laid the infrastructure foundation for the latest medical devices, equipment, and medical imaging units based on cutting-edge technologies. Imaging 1.5 Tesla MRI, 128 Slice Cardiac CT-Scan, High-End Color Doppler Ultrasound Systems, Latest ultrasound system with high frequency probes, 100 MA HF main frame and 500 MA HF X-ray with D.R

. System, C-Arm 9mm apparatus Cardiology & Cardiovascular Surgery Philips Cardiac Cath Lab with Stent Boost Technology, Next Gen ICD & CRT-D System, ECG, Holter, TMT (Trade Mill Test), Intraoperative Transoesophageal ECHO Gastroenterology Endoscopic ultrasound system, Capsule Endoscopy, Gastroscope, Colonoscope Respiratory Critical Care Video Bronchoscopy System, Digital Spirometer Dental Digital X-Ray Dermatology Laser Hair Reduction System, Skin Tightening Equipment ICU Mechanical Ventilator, High Frequency Ventilator for NICU, Bedside ECHO, PCA Pump, Portable X-Ray Viewer, Operating Microscope, Per/Intra Operative Imaging, Temperature Regulating Blanket, Rapid Transfusion System OT-Technology 6 Modular Laminar Fluid Dynamic Pressurized OT is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and the latest technology

. Home about us Department General Medicine General Surgery Gynaecology Pediatrics Orthopedics Cardiology Neurology Gastroenterologist Nephrology Psychiatrist Endocrinology Dermatologist Academic programme Medical College Nursing college Gallery Careers Contact us Speciality Departments Internal medicine This medical speciality deals with the diagnosis and medical treatment of diseases of the adult. It acts a nodal point for coordinating multidisciplinary therapeutic efforts for the best disease outcome. Our doctors are skilled to deliver the best diagnostic and therapeutic services and they play a pivotal role in management of patients with undiagnosed/ multisystem diseases

. Our doctors are skilled to deliver the best diagnostic and therapeutic services and they play a pivotal role in management of patients with undiagnosed/ multisystem diseases. Respiratory Medicine A sub-speciality of Internal medicine, this department deals with the treatment of diseases related to the airway and the lungs & certain sleep disorders like obstructive sleep apnoea and snoring. Our team of highly qualified doctors equipped with the latest imaging devices and technology are always there to look after any of your breathing distress or disorder. General Surgery Our general surgery department with our highly experienced, skilled and compassionate surgeons and staff, latest technology and devices always strive to make the surgical experience easy and less stressful

. We try to lessen the fear and anxiety associated with a surgery and expediate the post operative recovery process by opting for less invasive process (laparoscopic instead of open) where ever possible and through patient counselling, education and follow up. This department deals with a vast range of surgeries involving the GI tract & the abdomen, thyroid gland, hernia, Haemorrhoids, hydrocele, cysts and abscesses.Our team of general surgeons collaborate with specialists from other departments for complicated surgeries like hepatobiliary, colorectal, pancreatic vascular and surgeries involving the breast and the endocrine glands in order to meet the specific needs. Gynaecology & Obstetrics At PKG multispecialty hospital, the department of Gynaecology & Obstetrics address to the medical needs through every stage of a woman’s life from puberty to adolescence to pregnancy to menopause and any thing in between and beyond

. Through regular information sharing on women’s health, professional counselling, building the trust of the patient & by offering a safe space we try to ensure a pleasant experience for the patients so that they can share their issues freely

. Our team of specialists, the well-equipped delivery rooms, the gynaecology conversant Operation theatres, the dedicated ICUs and the latest range of imaging, monitoring & prenatal diagnostic devices and technology, and last but not the least, our team of specially trained support staffs cater to the entire range of services-From Proper family planning & informed reproductive decision making Infertility treatment Antenatal Care & Foetal Monitoring Parenting classes & counselling sessions Catering to the various birthing procedures, the individual needs and emergencies arising in high-risk pregnancy cases- We aim to make the birthing experience a memorable one Stem cell Banking Postnatal maternal care Catering to Adolescent gynaecological needs Treatment of PCOD, endometriosis, chronic pelvic pain Ectopic pregnancy, Uterine Fibroids Reproductive endocrine Care Menstrual care Menopausal management Vaginal surgeries Hysterectomy, Tubectomy Treatment of STD Routine preventive care (like

pain Ectopic pregnancy, Uterine Fibroids Reproductive endocrine Care Menstrual care Menopausal management Vaginal surgeries Hysterectomy, Tubectomy Treatment of STD Routine preventive care (like PAP Smear, mammography, bone densitometry etc.) Paediatrics The department of paediatrics deals with children and their diseases right from the time they are born till they are 12 years of age

. Our team of experienced specialists provide holistic multidisciplinary and specialized care & services like – 24*7 Paediatric and neonatal emergency Care Tertiary level Neonatal Intensive Care Paediatric intensive care Neonatal Surgery General Paediatric Surgery Paediatric cardiology Paediatric urology Paediatric endocrinology Paediatric haematology Paediatric nephrology Routine immunization Paediatric Infectious disease care HIGHLIGHTS We have 8 NICU and 8 PICUs equipped with the state-of-the-art equipment and technology like high frequency ventilator. Orthopaedics Our department of Orthopaedics with their team of renowned orthopaedic surgeons, occupational therapists and physiotherapists looks after your bone, joint & musculoskeletal health with the help of latest imaging technologies, devices, techniques & evidence based medicines. Our dedicated staffs provide the entire range of services from surgical to non-surgical to rehabilitative therapy

. Our dedicated staffs provide the entire range of services from surgical to non-surgical to rehabilitative therapy. It spans across – Management of Complex polytrauma cases Management of Injury from sports and physical activity Management of conditions like osteoarthritis & osteoporosis Management of ligament and tendon injury, joint and muscle pain Surgical management of bone fractures Surgical management of soft tissue injuries like infection, limb crush injuries, nerve repair Management of joint disorders and dislocations Surgical reconstruction/replacement of joints like knee, hip, ankle, and shoulder joints. Treatment of Lumbar & Cervical Spondylosis Treatment of congenital bone & muscle disorders Rehabilitation therapy HIGHLIGHTS Dedicated Ortho O.T with latest infrastructure 128 slice CT scan & 1.5 Tesla MRI for quality imaging C-Arm 9 mm for ortho surgery Ophthalmology Ophthalmology is the branch of medicine which looks after the physiology and diseases of the eye

. Here we administer the latest therapies and technology to treat all eye related problems through medication and surgery as follows- Disease of the cornea, conjunctiva, and the external eye Disease of retina, the treatment of retinal detachment Glaucoma Cataract Uveitis Strabismus Neuro-ophthalmic problems Refractive surgery Oculoplastics & orbital surgery Please feel free to reach out to our team of specialists if you have any difficulty in eye sight like abnormalities in vision (floaters, blurring, reduced distorted or double vision, seeing flash of light etc.), discomfort in eye (like redness, itchiness, pain, excessive tearing, dryness etc.), trauma in eye, sudden vision loss, sudden bulging or misalignment of eye. Otorhinolaryngology (E.N.T) Our department of Otorhinolaryngology provides comprehensive treatment to all problems related to the ear, nose and throat with the help of latest technology and equipment

. Our team of trained physicians conduct specialized screening tests like audiometry, vestibular test, nasal endoscopy, laryngoscopy other than routine radiographic examinations. They look after any nasal/ airway obstruction, deviated nasal septum, sinusitis, tonsillitis, hearing deficit/hearing loss , ear pain ,tinnitus, balance disorder, voice disorder, difficulty in speech /swallowing, any growth or lump in throat/ neck region etc. Dentistry The department of dentistry looks after the health of not only your teeth but the oral cavity in entirety

. Dentistry The department of dentistry looks after the health of not only your teeth but the oral cavity in entirety. From routine services like- Extraction Cavity filling & repair Scaling Prosthetic teeth placement (RPD, Complete Denture, Crown, Bridge) Root Canal Treatment To more cosmetic and complicated treatments like- Endodontic surgery Oral cancer screening & treatment of benign growths/mucosal disorders of the oral cavity Teeth whitening & veneers Full mouth rehabilitation Psychiatry Mental health is central to the overall well-being of an individual and his/her functioning to the full potential. Our team of psychiatrists & clinical psychologists take care of all mental disorders through comprehensive therapy/counselling sessions, behaviour therapy and the use of appropriate medications

. Our team of psychiatrists & clinical psychologists take care of all mental disorders through comprehensive therapy/counselling sessions, behaviour therapy and the use of appropriate medications. The common disorders taken care of are – Anxiety disorders Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder Depression Bipolar Disorder Phobia PTSD (Post- Traumatic Stress Disorder) Mental Disorder of Teens & Children Panic Disorder Other neuropsychiatric conditions like Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s disease Dermatology The department of Dermatology takes care of all your skin related ailments. Our team of specialists treat all types of skin infection and breakouts, dark spots & patches, conditions of skin allergy, psoriasis, eczema and skin cancer checks. With the use of latest infrastructure and technology we are on the plan of gradually expanding our cosmetology wing by providing treatments like laser hair reduction therapy, skin tightening therapy, Botox and anti-ageing therapy, mole removal etc

. Critical care The critical care department looks after the critically ill patient 24*7 and play a crucial role of reducing mortality by providing timely care and appropriate life saving interventions. Our multidisciplinary team of critical care fellows, intensivists, physical and respiratory therapists, nurses, pharmacists etc provide round the clock monitoring of the patients and prompt action whenever emergency arises. We have remote patient monitoring software in our system so as to ensure better monitoring and time to time necessary inputs from the consultant physicians. We have a 69 bedded critical care unit divided into medical, cardiac and surgical critical care units, isolated critical care setups and intensive care units for the neonatal and paediatric

. We have a 69 bedded critical care unit divided into medical, cardiac and surgical critical care units, isolated critical care setups and intensive care units for the neonatal and paediatric. Besides our 5 bedded Emergency department equipped with the advanced infrastructure and unit of proficient professionals are always at service with compassion, promptness and efficiency to deliver the best at the earliest from the moment a patient arrives in our premises with an emergency condition till he/she is shifted to the intensive/definitive care unit. We have a zero-tolerance policy towards ragging in any form, and we take every measure to ensure that our campus remains free from such activities. . Our Anti-Ragging Committee is composed of dedicated faculty members and student representatives who work diligently to prevent and address any instances of ragging. We conduct regular awareness programs to educate students about the detrimental effects of ragging and encourage a culture of respect, empathy, and camaraderie. Through these efforts, we aim to foster a nurturing atmosphere that allows every individual to thrive academically, professionally, and personally, without fear or intimidation. Together, we stand united against ragging, upholding the principles of dignity, respect, and compassion that define our institution. Gender cell :- At PKG Multispeciality Hospital, we are committed to creating an inclusive and safe environment for all individuals. The Gender Cell is a dedicated initiative that ensures gender sensitivity, equality, and support within our healthcare community

. The Gender Cell is a dedicated initiative that ensures gender sensitivity, equality, and support within our healthcare community. Comprising of trained professionals and volunteers, the Gender Cell actively promotes awareness and education on gender-related issues. It serves as a confidential space for individuals to voice concerns, seek guidance, and access appropriate resources. Our team is sensitive to the unique needs and challenges faced by patients and staff members of all genders. Through workshops, seminars, and ongoing dialogue, the Gender Cell contributes to fostering a culture of respect, dignity, and equal opportunity for everyone associated with PKG Multispeciality Hospital. Together, we work towards a healthcare environment that values and upholds the rights of every individual, regardless of gender identity or expression

. Together, we work towards a healthcare environment that values and upholds the rights of every individual, regardless of gender identity or expression. Our dedicated staff ensures that the premises are maintained impeccably, providing a clean and hygienic living space.
